rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A spacious entrance that welcomes guests and directs flow into the main living areas.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open plan living space with comfortable seating arrangements, ambient lighting, and Bohemian decor accents.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact but functional kitchen space designed for minimal food preparation, integrated seamlessly into the ground floor layout.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room; semi-outdoor area with a retractable pergola.

openings.location: Adjacent to the living room wall, allowing access to a small balcony
Leading from the dining area to the outdoor patio space

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master suite with an en-suite bathroom and a dedicated balcony. Decor inspired by Bohemian aesthetics, featuring vibrant colors and intricate patterns.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom with space for a study area; includes its own spacious balcony.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Cozy third bedroom designed with a private balcony and Bohemian decor elements.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library space on this floor, offering ample shelving for books, comfortable seating, and ambient lighting to create an inviting atmosphere.

openings.location: Connecting ground floor and first floor
Adjacent to each bedroom for access to the private balconies

rooms.name: Triple-plex Suite
rooms.description: The upper-level suite designed as a triplex arrangement with interconnected living spaces, incorporating modern Bohemian design elements and ample natural light.

openings.location: Connecting first floor to second floor

openings.description: Provides access to the expansive rooftop terrace, offering panoramic views and outdoor living space.
